title: Looking to add a few Sovereign 150, EPDG, OM, maybe Hindu
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking to add a few Sovereign 150, EPDG, OM, maybe Hindu
posts.post_content:
Looking for GD-VGEX examples with nice eye appeal.  Not interested in beaters, and probably can't afford 5s.  Graded or not is fine.  The reason I say maybe Hindu is I can't afford too many, but would like to add a couple.  Graded or raw is fine with me.  I have a ton of stuff to trade, but can also buy of course.  

My need list is below.  I would also be very interested in Piedmont 350s of Ewing, Lindaman, Mullin, Karger, Ganley and Tom Jones (of the elite 11)

[url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]
